00032 #include <stdlib.h> 
00033 
00034 #include "libless.h"
00035 #include "libless_quadratic.h"
00036 #include "libless_err.h"

00042 QUADRATIC *QD_new() {
00043         QUADRATIC *a = NULL;
00044         int code;
00045 
00046         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00047 
00048         TRY(a = (QUADRATIC *)malloc(sizeof(QUADRATIC)), return NULL);
00049         TRY(a->x = BN_new(), goto end);
00050         TRY(a->y = BN_new(), goto end);
00051 
00052         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00053 end:
00054         if (code != LIBLESS_OK) {
00055                 QD_free(a);
00056                 a = NULL;
00057         }
00058         return a;
00059 }
00060 
00061 int QD_sqr(QUADRATIC *r, QUADRATIC *a, BIGNUM *p, BN_MONT_CTX *mctx,
00062                 BN_CTX *ctx) {
00063         BIGNUM *t1 = NULL;
00064         BIGNUM *t2 = NULL;
00065         int code;
00066 
00067         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00068 
00069         TRY(t1 = BN_dup(a->x), goto end);
00070         TRY(t2 = BN_dup(a->x), goto end);
00071 
00072         /* Compute t1 = (a_x + a_y). */
00073         TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t1, t1, a->y, p), goto end);
00074 
00075         /* Compute t2 = (a_x - a_y). */
00076         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(t2, t2, a->y, p), goto end);
00077 
00078         /* Compute r_y = a_x*a_y. */
00079         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(r->y, a->x, a->y, mctx, ctx), goto end);
00080 
00081         /* Compute r_x = (a_x + a_y)*(a_x - a_y). */
00082         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(r->x, t1, t2, mctx, ctx), goto end);
00083         
00084         /* Compute r_y = 2*a_x*a_y. */
00085         TRY(BN_mod_lshift1_quick(r->y, r->y, p), goto end);
00086 
00087         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00088 end:
00089         BN_free(t1);
00090         BN_free(t2);
00091         return code;
00092 }
00093 
00094 int QD_mul(QUADRATIC *r, QUADRATIC *a, QUADRATIC *b, BIGNUM *p,
00095                 BN_MONT_CTX *mctx, BN_CTX *ctx) {
00096         BIGNUM *t1 = NULL;
00097         BIGNUM *t2 = NULL;
00098         BIGNUM *t3 = NULL;
00099         int code;
00100 
00101         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00102 
00103         if (a == b) {
00104                 return QD_sqr(r, a, p, mctx, ctx);
00105         }
00106 
00107         TRY(t1 = BN_dup(a->x), goto end);
00108         TRY(t2 = BN_dup(a->y), goto end);
00109         TRY(t3 = BN_dup(b->x), goto end);
00110 
00111         /* t1 = a_x*b_x. */
00112         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t1, t1, b->x, mctx, ctx), goto end);
00113 
00114         /* t2 = a_y*b_y. */
00115         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t2, t2, b->y, mctx, ctx), goto end);
00116 
00117         /* t3 = (b_x + b_y). */
00118         TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t3, t3, b->y, p), goto end);
00119 
00120         /* r_y = a_x + a_y. */
00121         TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(r->y, a->x, a->y, p), goto end);
00122 
00123         /* r_y = (a_x + a_y)*(b_x + b_y). */
00124         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(r->y, r->y, t3, mctx, ctx), goto end);
00125 
00126         /* r_y = (a_x + a_y)*(b_x + b_y) - (a_x*b_x). */
00127         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(r->y, r->y, t1, p), goto end);
00128 
00129         /* r_y = (a_x + a_y)*(b_x + b_y) - (a_x*b_x) - (a_y*b_y). */
00130         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(r->y, r->y, t2, p), goto end);
00131 
00132         /* r_x = (a_x*b_x - a_y*b_y). */
00133         TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(r->x, t1, t2, p), goto end);
00134 
00135         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00136 end:
00137         BN_free(t1);
00138         BN_free(t2);
00139         BN_free(t3);
00140         return code;
00141 }
00142 
00143 int QD_conj(QUADRATIC *r, QUADRATIC *a, BIGNUM *p, BN_CTX *ctx) {
00144         int code;
00145 
00146         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00147 
00148         if (a == r) {
00149                 TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(r->y, p, r->y, p), goto end);
00150         } else {
00151                 TRY(BN_copy(r->x, a->x), goto end);
00152                 TRY(BN_mod_sub_quick(r->y, p, a->y, p), goto end);
00153         }
00154         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00155 end:
00156         return code;
00157 }
00158 
00159 int QD_inv(QUADRATIC *r, QUADRATIC *a, BIGNUM *p, BN_MONT_CTX *mctx,
00160                 BN_CTX *ctx) {
00161         QUADRATIC *t1 = NULL;
00162         QUADRATIC *t2 = NULL;
00163         BIGNUM *t3 = NULL;
00164         BIGNUM *t4 = NULL;
00165         int code;
00166 
00167         code = LIBLESS_ERROR;
00168 
00169         BN_CTX_start(ctx);
00170         TRY(t1 = QD_new(), goto end);
00171         TRY(t2 = QD_new(), goto end);
00172         TRY(t3 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), goto end);
00173         TRY(t4 = BN_CTX_get(ctx), goto end);
00174 
00175         TRY(QD_conj(t1, a, p, ctx), goto end);
00176 
00177         /* t3 = a_x^2, t4 = a_y^2. */
00178         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t3, a->x, a->x, mctx, ctx), goto end);
00179         TRY(BN_mod_mul_montgomery(t4, a->y, a->y, mctx, ctx), goto end);
00180 
00181         /* t3 = a_x^2 + a_y^2. */
00182         TRY(BN_mod_add_quick(t3, t3, t4, p), goto end);
00183 
00184         /* t3 = t3^(-1). */
00185         TRY(BN_mod_inverse(t3, t3, p, ctx), goto end);
00186 
00187         TRY(BN_copy(t2->x, t3), goto end);
00188         TRY(BN_zero(t2->y), goto end);
00189 
00190         /* If a is in Montgomery form aR mod p, this will compute (aR)^(-1) mod p.*/
00191         TRY(QD_mul(r, t1, t2, p, mctx, ctx), goto end);
00192 
00193         /* Correct Montgomery form (a^(-1)R mod p. */
00194         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(r->x, r->x, mctx, ctx), goto end);
00195         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(r->x, r->x, mctx, ctx), goto end);
00196         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(r->y, r->y, mctx, ctx), goto end);
00197         TRY(BN_to_montgomery(r->y, r->y, mctx, ctx), goto end);
00198 
00199         code = LIBLESS_OK;
00200 end:
00201         QD_free(t1);
00202         QD_free(t2);
00203         BN_CTX_end(ctx);
00204         return code;
00205 }
00206 
00207 int QD_is_zero(QUADRATIC *a) {
00208         return (BN_is_zero(a->x) && BN_is_zero(a->y));
00209 }
00210 
00211 void QD_free(QUADRATIC *a) {
00212         if (a != NULL) {
00213                 if (a->x != NULL) {
00214                         BN_free(a->x);
00215                 }
00216                 if (a->y != NULL) {
00217                         BN_free(a->y);
00218                 }
00219                 free(a);
00220         }
00221 }
